com.spid.android.sdk.webview

Class SPiDWebView

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.view.View
      • android.view.ViewGroup
        • android.widget.AbsoluteLayout
          • android.webkit.WebView
            • com.spid.android.sdk.webview.SPiDWebView
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.graphics.drawable.Drawable.Callback, android.view.accessibility.AccessibilityEventSource, android.view.KeyEvent.Callback, android.view.ViewGroup.OnHierarchyChangeListener, android.view.ViewManager, android.view.ViewParent, android.view.ViewTreeObserver.OnGlobalFocusChangeListener

    public class SPiDWebView
extends android.webkit.WebView
    A custom WebView that simplifies logging in, signing up and using the forgot password functionalities with SPiD

        public void loadAuthenticationURL(SPiDAuthenticationListener listener)
        Loads the authentication URL
        Parameters:
        listener - Listener called on completion or failure
        Throws:
        SPiDAuthenticationAlreadyRunningException - if an authentication request is already running

        Loads the signup URL
        Parameters:
        listener - Listener called on completion or failure
        Throws:
        SPiDAuthenticationAlreadyRunningException - if an authentication request is currently in progress
